original_title: Noch leb ich ja! Ein AIDs-Kranker erz√§hlt
overview: In a series of intimate talks, Peter S., the subject of the documentary, reflects with insight and reverence on dying, loving and living with the disease that has altered the course of our lives. I'm Still Alive! is a testament to the wisdom and resilience of the human spirit.
title: I'm Still Alive! A Person with AIDs Tells His Story
